keyword: calories in a costco hot dog
title: Calories in a Costco Hot Dog
meta_description: Discover calories in a Costco hot dog, including full nutrition breakdown with protein, fat, carbs, sodium, and easy tweaks for your meal.
h1: Calories in a Costco Hot Dog
assumptions: Kirkland Signature all-beef frank (1/4 lb, steamed) with sesame seed bun; no condiments or toppings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by preparation, exact size, and added toppings; check Costco packaging or app for latest values.

quick_answer.text: A Costco hot dog with bun provides about 570 kcal, high in sodium and fat.

basis.label: per 1 Costco hot dog with bun

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Add ketchup, mustard, and relish (standard toppings)

faqs.q: How many calories are in a Costco hot dog?
faqs.a: About 570 kcal for one hot dog with bun, no condiments.

faqs.q: What's the sodium in a Costco hot dog?
faqs.a: Around 1610 mg per hot dog, so watch your intake.

faqs.q: Is the Costco hot dog high in protein?
faqs.a: It has 16 g protein, decent for a quick meal.

faqs.q: How does adding condiments affect calories in a Costco hot dog?
faqs.a: Standard ketchup, mustard, and relish add about 30 kcal.
No, due to the wheat bun; opt for no bun for gluten concerns.
